alert.note: Alert for Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 18 at 3:46AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...LOCALLY DENSE FOG... Fog has developed across portions of Garrett County this morning, with the lowest visibilities generally observed on the ridges. Visibility in some locations may be reduced to less than one eighthof a mile. The fog is resulting in poor travel conditions on Interstate 68. Expect gradually improving conditions by 9 AM. Dense fog is hazardous if driving at high speeds. Be prepared for rapidly changing visibility. Slow down, increase following distance, and use low beam headlights when encountering dense fog.
